steps.title: Generous
steps.content: Generous Capricorns put their partner’s satisfaction above their own. And really, they take pleasure in pleasing you. They’ll do whatever it takes to make you feel good, which makes them excellent lovers. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Adventurous
steps.content: Adventurous Capricorns are more than a little kinky. [2] X Research source They’re not afraid to go off the beaten path or introduce you to new sensations. If you’re here for a new experience, you’re in the right place.

steps.title: Patient
steps.content: Patient Astrologer Tara Divina says that “a Capricorn might be slower to make a move, take a little longer, contemplate it, plan it out a little more in advance versus being spontaneous.” That means that, in bed, Capricorns are all about the slow burn and savoring your time together. They get satisfaction from the process, not the destination.

steps.title: Low-Maintenance
steps.content: Low-Maintenance Astrologer Stina Garbis says that “Capricorn is not generally a ‘mushy’ sign, they are more practical about the people they love.” They don’t need grand displays of affection to prove you love them , and in fact prefer to give rather than receive.

steps.title: Physical
steps.content: Physical Capricorns are all about physical sensations in bed. [3] X Research source They use touch to connect, and they savor those intimate moments of contact. Caressing, pushing, squeezing—they’re one of the more handsy signs, for sure.

steps.title: Choosy
steps.content: Choosy A Capricorn doesn’t let just anyone into their bed. Astrologer Stina Garbis says that they “do not socialize well outside of their few close companions, and they love these people dearly.” So if you find yourself in the sheets with a Capricorn, consider yourself one of a lucky few.

steps.title: Dominant
steps.content: Dominant Capricorns love to take the lead, both in life and in sex. [4] X Research source They know what they want and how to get it, and enjoy a partner who’ll let them have it.

steps.title: Ambition
steps.content: Ambition Astrologer Angel Eyedealism says that Capricorns are “incredibly ambitious,” and likewise are “wanting to date or marry for someone who will be helpful in a practical way to them.” They need to know that you can keep up.

steps.title: Boundaries
steps.content: Boundaries Capricorns like clear lines between work and play, and appreciate it when you set boundaries for what the both of you want from the relationship. Astrologer Stina Garbis says to “keep work and drama out of the bedroom” to keep a Capricorn happy.

steps.title: High standards
steps.content: High standards Capricorns are picky about the people they surround themselves with, and they expect the same from you. If they feel that you’d go for just anyone, they tend to lose interest. They like to feel special and wanted.

steps.title: Responsibility
steps.content: Responsibility Capricorns like partners who can stand up for themselves and their friends. It shows that when the cards are on the table, you’re playing to win, and that you’ll make a great ally.

steps.title: Neatness
steps.content: Neatness From the way someone dresses to the state of their bedroom, Capricorns prioritize organization and presentability. To them, the outside speaks to the inside, and while it’s not a total dealbreaker, they may take a mess as a red flag.

steps.title: Vulnerability
steps.content: Vulnerability Capricorns are big protectors. Astrologer Stina Garbis says, “Allow [them] to lead, be soft natured and compliment [their] serious side, and [they] will want to nurture and take care of you.”

steps.title: Sloppy appearances
steps.content: Sloppy appearances Capricorns take pride in their appearance, and that includes that of their partners. They want to show you off when dating , and they can’t do that if their partner doesn’t put effort into how they look. They don’t need you in a cocktail dress or three-piece suit, per se, but it’d sure help.

steps.title: Laziness
steps.content: Laziness Capricorns are all about responsibility and punctuality. Astrologer Angel Eyedealism says, “If a date showed up an hour late, [Capricorns] would not have sex with them. They'd be like, I'm so offended by your lack of protocol.”

steps.title: Pushiness
steps.content: Pushiness Astrologer Tara Divina says that with Capricorns, you need to have “patience for [them] to pursue [you] at [their] own pace, not expecting him to move at your pace.” If you push them, it’s more likely that they’ll bail altogether, rather than change themselves for you.

steps.title: Neediness
steps.content: Neediness If there’s one thing a Capricorn can’t stand, it’s a partner who needs constant access. Let them do their thing and trust that they’ll shower you with affection when the time is right. Astrologer Stina Garbis adds, “Try not to blow up [their] phone with extra long text messages.” Keep it touch-and-go, and give a Capricorn their space.

steps.title: Competition
steps.content: Competition When a Capricorn likes you, you have their full attention. They want the same treatment from you. If your eyes wander, they’ll take note and dip without a moment’s hesitation. They’re in it for commitment and connection, not to play games.

steps.title: Drama
steps.content: Drama Capricorns don’t have much time for other people’s baggage, and definitely not when it comes to the bedroom. Astrologer Stina Garbis says to “leave the drama at home with your friends, [and] try not to be overly dramatic to your Capricorn partner.”

steps.title: Taurus
steps.content: Taurus Capricorns and Tauruses get along great in bed. Tauruses tend to open up under the generous and sensitive touch of a Capricorn, and this combination makes for steamy sexual chemistry. [15] X Research source Are-Capricorns-Compatible-with-Taurus

steps.title: Pisces
steps.content: Pisces Pisces and Capricorns are a great fit when things get frisky. Pisces’ laid-back flexibility complements Capricorn’s slow-going procedure. [6] X Research source What’s more, a Pisces easily sees what a Capricorn wants, and knows how to provide it.

steps.title: Virgo
steps.content: Virgo Capricorns and Virgos are on the same page in bed. Both like to take it slow, and the journey is more important than the destination. They’re thoughtful lovers to each other, and work as a team to find pleasure. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Cancer
steps.content: Cancer Both Capricorns and Cancers understand the need to get to know each other before things move to the bedroom. And if the talking stage goes well, so will the touching stage. Both are in it for connection and commitment, which makes for a powerful and passionate cocktail of emotions.

steps.title: Scorpio
steps.content: Scorpio Capricorns and Scorpios can both be too calculating for their own good. But once they figure each other out, their sexual chemistry skyrockets. For this pair, it’s all about communication and patience.

steps.title: Capricorn
steps.content: Capricorn A pair of Capricorns can go either way. [8] X Research source Either there’s immediate understanding, recognition, and passion, or seeing each other is like looking into a mirror, and things get a little too familiar for comfort.

steps.title: Aquarius
steps.content: Aquarius At the end of the day, Capricorns and Aquariuses have different sexual appetites. Aquarius is spontaneous; Capricorn is cool and steady. [9] X Research source Sometimes these opposites attract, but mostly they end up on far sides of the bed.

steps.title: Sagittarius
steps.content: Sagittarius Sagittarians and Capricorns aren’t the best sexual combo. For Sagittariuses, sex is often casual and no big deal, which clashes with Capricorn’s need for trust and commitment. It can work, but it’ll take some effort from both partners to understand each other. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Libra
steps.content: Libra Libras and Capricorns don’t make the best bedfellows. Libras see sex as a route to connection, while Capricorns see it as something that happens once a connection is made. These opposing views tend to cause some friction in the bedroom.

steps.title: Leo
steps.content: Leo A Capricorn and Leo pairing is hit or miss. Leos are mushy and tender, and Capricorns prefer a more practical approach to sex. They often want the same thing—a deeper emotional connection—but go about it in different ways. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Aries
steps.content: Aries Capricorns and Aries can make it work in bed, but they’re not the best fit. The problem is that they both want to be in charge, which can create obstacles or miscommunications. Often, the attraction is there, but the gears don’t quite fit together. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Gemini
steps.content: Gemini Capricorns and Geminis don’t make the best lovers for each other. Geminis like to move fast and talk through it, while a Capricorn prefers to go slow and let their body do the talking. It can work with lots of communication, but that’s likely what it’ll be—work.
